it had to do initially we notice that this is very problematic both from a
client side of things especially if you have too many crds but also from the uh from the server
side because it has to respond to so many requests so we came up with the idea of having all those data combined
and you do only a single request to the Discovery endpoint and it presents you with the whole um information about all
the resources that the cluster provides which obviously speeds up uh both the
server side processing but also client because it's only a single request yes the data that it has to read is more or
less of a similar size but the fact that it only does in a single request
significantly uh lowers the load on the cluster and on on the server and it handles each cache separately so when it
has to renew a single resource or a single group it doesn't have to fetch the entire surface of your API so if you
